pages.text: Have you ever wondered why you need to make fancy machines, or drop anvils, just to grind an item down into dust when you already have a perfectly functional grindstone?

I did. You can now use the grindstone in to grind down items. By default, only a few recipes are included, but you can use datapacks to add as many as you want. The only limitation is that the recipe must consume exactly one item per craft.
